sub_title: A professional with more than 26 years of experience around the world.
summary:
Nationality of the Republic of Kazakhstan. I consider offers to work remotely or on a rotational basis. Ready for relocation. 

A professional with more than 25 years of experience studying, working and traveling in Europe, South and Central America, the Caribbean and the United States. Constantly increasing self-education. Extremely punctual. Excellent organizational skills. Analytical mind. Excellent communication skills.

At work:
Promote teamwork by leading by example (behavior, communication)
Communicate effectively with a multinational workforce and promote a productive culture
Work independently without any external support
Do not hesitate to consult with professionals to avoid mistakes
Use feedback to improve my own work 
Write and speak clearly and persuasively, using appropriate arguments, style, and language
Active listening skills
Participate in organizing conferences, cultural and community events
MS Office, Excel (programs)
Foreign languages: fluent English, Espanol, Frances
Business skills and personal qualities
Experience in price negotiations
Management skills
Attention to detail, ability to work with large amounts of information
Ability to solve problems
Ability to notice details
Ability to plan your time
Ability to adapt
High work capacity
Ability to work in a multitasking mode
Integrity and honesty

Human Resources Management

My education also includes human resource management. The HMG 411, Human resource management, is a required course for graduation based on the study of the following programs:

Human Resource Policy and Practice: employee selection, training, motivation, evaluation, and compensation; Labor Relations; Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) Law.

The remaining courses are described at the link below:
https://southseattle.edu/programs/hospitality-management/hospitality-management-bachelor-applied-science-degree-bas

education.degree_name: Associate of Arts and Sciences - AAS

profile_positions.description: Installation of grain silos based on the requirements and specifications of the manufacturer. Installation of a solid concrete foundation under the tank and organization of a pit for unloading the material, assembly according to the specified order with the installation of supporting elements, sheathing sheets with sealing gaskets, installation of attachment equipment, ventilation system, aspiration, revision, loading and unloading hatches. Dismantling of buildings.
profile_positions.title: Installation of grain siloses in Europe Spain, France, Germany, The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
During periods of total lockdown and quarantine in 2020, while in Germany, I negotiated with the German manufacturer of servers Meinberg LanTime M300 Combined GPS/Glonass, as a result of which the Almaty company won the tender for the purchase of servers for computers of the local bank. The servers were safely delivered to Kazakhstan and after customs clearance shipped to the customer. 
Translations of documentation, correspondence with the management of the manufacturer's plant, control of delivery.
profile_positions.title: Individual Entrepreneurship / Private Practice / Freelance

profile_positions.description:
Translations of scientific, technical, economic, and other special literature and documentation related to the work of the department, reports, weekly, monthly monitoring reports, newsletters, operating instructions, descriptions, methods, contracts, agreements, methodological sheets, memoranda, reports, appendices to documents, clarifications, letters, regulatory and telegraphic documentation, correspondence with foreign organizations, DWG, correspondence between the department and customers/contractors, minutes of meetings, conferences, seminars.
Performing oral, written, full and abridged translations within the set deadlines, ensuring accurate compliance of translations with the lexical, stylistic and semantic content of the originals, compliance with the established requirements for scientific and technical terms and definitions.
Checking the correctness of translations made by third-party translators, making necessary corrections and editing.
Translating complex schemes and spreadsheets in various document formats. Providing interpretation (English, Russian) at daily meetings, negotiations, business and VIP-meetings with public officials, etc.
Successful commissioning of a gas turbine power plant.
profile_positions.title: Technical english interpreter for the construction of a gas turbine power plant. SEZ  "NIPT"

profile_positions.description: Organization of tours, transfers and shopping. Translations.
profile_positions.title: Tour guide - Interpreter

profile_positions.description:
Translations of scientific, technical, economic and other special literature, descriptions, methodologies, contracts, agreements, methodological sheets, reports, appendices to documents, clarifications, letters, regulatory and telegraphic documentation, correspondence with foreign organizations, conference materials, meetings, seminars and so on.
Simultaneous and consecutive interpretation of meetings, minutes and other working moments.
profile_positions.title: Technical English Translator and Interpreter

profile_positions.description:
Translations of scientific, technical, economic and other special literature, descriptions, methodologies, contracts, agreements, methodological sheets, reports, appendices to documents, explanations, letters, regulatory technical and telegraphic documentation, correspondence with foreign organizations, conference materials, meetings, seminars and so on.
Timely performance of oral and written translations, ensuring accurate compliance of translations with the lexical, stylistic and semantic content of the originals, compliance with the established requirements to the scientific and technical terms and definitions used. 
Participating in weekly progress meetings.  Completion of bilingual meeting minutes, coordinating and correcting minutes with the Project Control Manager. Translation of CaTRo (MaTraG) documentation for Tengiz TCO FGD project.
profile_positions.title: Technical English Translator and Interpreter

profile_positions.description: Translations of scientific, technical, economic and other special literature, descriptions, methodologies, contracts, agreements, methodological sheets, reports, appendices to documents, clarifications, letters, normative-technical and telegraphic documentation, correspondence with foreign organizations, conference materials, meetings, seminars and so on. Meeting and seeing off foreign guests at the airport.  Organization of transfers.
profile_positions.title: Technical English Translator and Interpreter

profile_positions.description:
Participation in the development and implementation of projects related to the activities of the sales department. Maintaining the client base. Control of proper and timely payment of goods by customers and timely shipment of goods under concluded contracts to the right place and buyer.
Ensuring that merchandise is always available for sale and properly stored in accordance with store safety standards.Maintaining advanced knowledge of all products in the department, being in constant contact with Home Depot managers to achieve the overall goal of meeting the needs of each store customer. Carrying out preventive measures to prevent loss of inventory of the company.Searching for potential customers, conducting commercial negotiations with customers, receiving and processing customer orders, preparing the necessary documents.Finding out the needs of customers in the products sold by the company, matching orders with customers according to their needs and the availability of the range. Motivating the client to work with the company in accordance with the approved programs to stimulate sales. Drawing up monthly sales plan.Keeping records of sales and shipments to customers of the company.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating purchasing department activities related to the receipt and distribution of food, beverages and other supplies for the hotel and its outlets.
Receiving, storing, and dispensing food and beverages.
Receiving parcels/courier deliveries. Registration and delivery of parcels received to destination.
Inspecting, unpacking and storing received merchandise.
Inspection of requisitions. Inspecting refrigeration units for deviations from specified temperatures. Quality control of perishable products (recording temperatures in the daily log).
Compliance with Marriott hotels operating procedures, South Carolina sanitation regulations.
Maintaining a safe and healthy work environment according to 
Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) standards and regulations.
Maintaining a list of missing and/or unreceived "goods" for follow-up action.
Directing the work of the warehouse in receiving, storing and releasing goods, their placement taking into account the maximum use of warehouse space.
Ensuring the safety of stored goods, adhering to storage regimes, preparing a place to receive received goods, distributing incoming correspondence to the appropriate hotel departments.
profile_positions.title: Shipping and Receiving Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Loss prevention operations and security at the company's premises and facilities.
Controlling the movement of goods and personnel around the territory. Monitoring surveillance video footage to prevent loss of merchandise.
Assisting emergency personnel in the event of an emergency. Conducting inventories, controlling deliveries, moving and distributing oil and gas and other equipment.
Participating in internal investigations, maintaining confidentiality in handling personal data and documentation, and conducting training for company employees on loss prevention.
Performed random searches of personnel and investigated suspicious situations within the company. Partnered with management to train employees on safety, company policies and proper procedures.
profile_positions.title: Loss Prevention Manager
